Config.Title: Active Light Config:
Config.Bounce: Make animation bounce back and forth
Config.Randomize: Randomize offset based on current duration
Config.Offset: Time Offset in milliseconds for "desyncing" similar animations
Config.Manual: Start animation when light is enabled
Config.ManualDesc: Allows a GM to control when an animation begins by toggling the light on/off to play/reset the animation.

Warnings.KeyFrame_Zero: You cannot set a custom Key Frame to time ZERO!
Warnings.KeyFrame_Exists: A Key Frame already exists for time {0} Seconds
